name: Diluc
title: The Dark Side of Dawn
description: Born into the affluent Ragnvindr Clan, Diluc is the current owner of the Dawn Winery and a nobleman of high esteem in Mondstadt. While a past incident caused him to split ways with the Knights of Favonius, he continues to protect Mondstadt in his own way.

skills.name: Tempered Sword
skills.description: Normal Attack: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Searing Onslaught
skills.description: Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG. This skill can be consecutively used 3 times. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.

skills.name: Dawn
skills.description: Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG. The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro.

passives.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

passives.name: Relentless
passives.description: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passives.name: Blessing of Phoenix
passives.description: The Pyro Infusion provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.description: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s. This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Fire and Steel
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.description: Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt. 2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Dawn by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.description: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%. Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.
